BRADLEY & SMITH'S BRUSHES

ManStocturers, gave the address of BRADLEY & SMITH 261 Pearl 
Streot. Trow'S Directory for 1910 shows BRADLEY & SMITH

BRADLEY & SMITH'S BRUSHES 

The New York Business Directory for 1800. under the heading Brush 
Manufacturers, gave the address of BRADLEY & SMITH, 251 Pearl 
Street. Trow's Directory for 1910 shows BRADLEY & SMITH 

At "ti-se: saivi^ location

BRADLEY & SMITH'S BRUSHES 

The New York Business Directory for 1800, under the heading Brush 
Manufacturers, gave the address of BRADLEY A SMITH, 251 Pearl 
Street. Trow'a Directory for 1910 shows BRADLEY & SMITH

Manufacturers, gave the address of BRADLEY & SMITH, 251 Pearl 
Street. Trow'3 Directory for 1910 shows BRADLEY' A SMITH

BRADLEY & SMITH'S BRUSHES 

The New York Business Directory for 1800, under the heading Brush 
Manufacturers, gave the address of BRADLEY & SMITH 261 Pearl 
Street. Trow's Directory for 1910 shows BRADLEY & SMITH

BRADLEY & SMITH'S BRUSH! 

The New York Business Directory for 1800, under the heading Brush 
Manufacturers, gave the address of BRADLEY & SMITH, 251 Pearl 
Street. Trow's Directory for 1910 shows BRADLEY & SMITH

THRIFT MORTGAGES 



You want a lioine. We can help you get it as we have thousands 
of others. Our mortgages are liberal in amount, cost less than straight 
mortgages, easy monthly payments free your home from mortgage debt 
in twelve years or less. You ought to know about them. 



Money in hand is a very comfortable possession. You would like 
the money but have never saved any. Our forms now attract over 
seventy-five hundred depositors. We shall be glad to tell you about 
them. 

Send for a booklet. (Our representative will call on request . ) 

THE THRIFT 

FOUNDED BY CHARLES PRATT, 1889 
(Incorporated under the. Untitling Law) 

207 RYEHSON STREET. BROOKLYN. 

OFFICE HOURS : 

Daily, 9 to 5 

Saturday, 9 to 12 Telephone, Proipect 2200 

Monday Evening*, 7.30 to 9

KEW GARDENS 



Kcw Gardens and Richmond 1 lill constitute a restricted residential park of too acres, 
stretching from Richmond Hill Station (Montauk Division) over the hills to Kew Station 
'Main lane) L 1 R. R., with upwards of 100 trains daily and is l.j minutes (9 miles) 
from Pennsylvania Station 

Its natural beauty, attractive development, location on the summit of the Island 
with a frontage of a mile on Forest Park, combined with the fact that it already enjoys 
all the comforts and facilities of the city and has an established community, with churches, 
schools, shopping facilities, clubs and activities of every kind, ensure- its permanence m 
a social centre;, and a rapid increase in values. 

For particulars apply by letter or telephone to 



KEW GARDENS, 

JOHN J. HRITTON, S»le« Manager 
Marbridge Building, Broadway, Corner 34-th Street, New York Tel. Greek) 5350

1600 



Are Your Collars 
Broken at the Point ? 




NOT IF WE 



LAUNDER THEM 

COLLARS TWENTY WEEKS TO OUR LAUNDRY 

We bought a number of new collars and laundered and relaundered them just to see how long 
they would last. Twenty times we laundered them before they cracked, became rough edged 
or ragged. 

It means twenty weeks satisfactory wear, or about five months usage in each of your collars. 
Really it means more— fully six months, because after they do become worn our operators 
smooth down the rough edges. 

Your Entire Household Washing at a Price that will Interest any House- 
keeper. Try it and avoid the worry and mess of wash day.

The above prices on flat work apply where at least 25c. worth is sent at one time, and in a 
separate package. When flat work and rough dry are sent in same package the charge will be 6c. 
per lb. for the entire package.

E. BELCHER HYDE 

97 Liberty Street, Brooklyn 5 Beekman Street, Manhattan 

PUBLISHER OF 

Real Estate Atlases of the Boroughs of New York City, 
( Richmond excepted ) 



Brooklyn Borough. Complete in 8 volumes at $40. per volume. Scale 100 feet 
to the inch. First 4 volumes embracing Brooklyn Proper, re- 
maining 4 volumes the Suburban District. Corrections have been 
published for all the volumes each 6 months. 

Manhattan Borough. Complete in 4 volumes at $40.00 per volume. Scale 80 feet 

to 1 inch. Volume 1, Battery to 23d Street. Volume 2, 
23rd Street to 72d Street. Volume 3, 72d Street to 125th 
Street. Volume 4, 125th Street to Spuytin Duyvil. Cor- 
rections for each of these volumes have been published monthly. 

Manhattan Borough. Complete in 1 volume at $35. Scale 160 feet to 1 inch. 

Corrections also have been published semi-annually. 

Bronx Borough. Complete in 3 volumes at $35 per volume. Scale 80 feet to 1 
inch. Volume 1, 23d Ward. Volume 2, Lower half of 24th 
Ward. Volume 3, Upper half of 24th Ward. Corrections have been 
published quarterly. The Annexed District to be issued later on. 

Queens Borough. Originally complete in 3 volumes. New volumes will be published 
soon. In so doing a rearrangement of these volumes will be 
found necessary, owing to the late new City surveys. Call phone 
6 1 39 Cortlandt for further information in relation thereto. 

Nassau County. Complete in one volume $30. 

Suffolk County. Originally Published in 2 volumes. A rearrangement also for new 
volumes of this County when published later on. 

Westchester County and Connecticut Townships, viz.: Greenwich, Stamford, 
Darien, New Caanan and Ridgefield. Showing farming Country 
especially. Price $ 18.00

MINIATURE ATLASES 

OF THE 

Borough of Manhattan in I volume ready for delivery 

Borough of Brooklyn in 2 volumes 

Borough of Bronx in 2 volumes in press 

Borough of Queens in 4 volumes 

These Miniature Atlases are photo-lithographic reproductions of the large Atlases, 
with corrections included in the same and are very valuable publications, Price of all 
these Atlases, $5. per volume. 

CABINET ATLAS CASES 

With Metal Roller Shelves 

The publisher's original idea, in order that such valuable volumes might be kept clean 

and in good shape. Made in Dark Antique or Natural Oak, or of other material to match 

any office furniture. Cases to hold 8, 1 0, or 12 atlases, made to order. Very few kept in 

stock. Orders should be given with the expectation that a little time will be required to fill 

the same. 

PRICES 

Oak Cabinets holding 8 Atlases, $50.00 
"10 " 55.00 

"12 " 60.00 

CANOPY MAP HOODS 

WITH SPRING ROLLERS AND ATTACHMENTS 

Most of large maps are arranged with extension mounting and spring roller. They 
can be used and referred to with much greater convenience. 

Have your map arranged in this way. They are easily managed. 

Up and out of the way when not in use. Always clean and new. 

Old maps remounted and arranged for Map Flood case. 

Special attention given to the rebinding of atlases. 

The best bound Atlases, after two or three years of constant wear and tear, reach 
that condition where it becomes necessary to have them rebound. I am in a position to at 
tend to all this work at reasonable rates, having a plant for that special purpose.

WE SPECIALIZE IN THESE.

PRACTICAL TEACHERS.

follow them up and get better ones — 
SYSTEM.

The New No. 8 Blickensderfer Typewriter has all of the LATEST IM- 
PROVEMENTS in the typewriter line. Decimal Tabulator, Hack Spacer, Holler 
Bearing Carriage, Adjustable Margins, Paper Release, Automatic Pointer, Auto_ 
raatic Line Spacer, Variable Line Spacer, Interchangeable Type, Visible Writing 
and Direct Inking and Printing. 

It combines all of the best features of other typewriters and, in addition, has 
special features of its own not found in any other make. 

It has great strength and durability, is easy to operate, requires no in- 
structions.
